item.title: Spotify Songs
item.description: Spotify Songs This data set comes from the spotify_songs.csv file on the Tidy Tuesday website. The data consists of 32,833 observations of 23 variables. The variables track_id, track_album_id, and playlist_id are all unique IDs for the track, album, and playlist, respectively. The variables track_name, track_artist, track_album_id, track_album_name, and track_album_release_date are all variables that give details on the track to help with identification. The variables playlist_name, playlist_genre, and playlist_subgenre give information on what type of track it is, in other words what type of playlists it is on.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
